0.0.2.name: wordpress/feedburner-optin-form
0.0.2.description:
This plugin adds an email subscription form anywhere on your WordPress website. Add it to the end of posts to increase your subscriber count. This plugin is an implementation of the FeedBurner Optin form found here.

There are two different formats: a 'main' format for most applications, and a 'sidebar' format for putting the form into your sidebar or smaller areas.

Features

  • Display on any post or page
  • Completely self contained, includes CSS from blog post
  • CSS is only included on posts or pages where form is displayed
  • Automatically insert at the end of single posts

Shortcode

To display the form on any post or page, use this shortcode:

[fb-optin-form]

Make sure you go to the plugin settings page after installing to set options.

If you use and enjoy this plugin, please rate it and click the "W
